summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Self-Sufficient Lifestyle Management App Phase 3 features. All diary, gallery, blog, and library functionality working excellently with rich text editor integration. Backend APIs performing perfectly with 34/34 tests passing (100% success rate). Frontend UI/UX excellent with seamless integration and all Phase 3 features fully functional.

design_issues.issue: TipTap console warnings about duplicate extension names for 'link' and 'underline'
Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: Admin login successful
Projects page loads correctly
Project detail page shows Phase 3 feature cards (Diary, Gallery, Blog, Library)
Diary page loads from project detail
Create diary entry with rich text editor works perfectly
Diary entry title and datetime inputs functional
Rich text editor content saves correctly
Diary entries appear in list after creation
Diary search functionality working
Diary entry editing and updating works
Gallery page loads with proper layout
Create gallery folders functionality working
Gallery folder creation dialog and form working
Gallery folders appear in list after creation
Blog page loads correctly
Create blog entry with rich text editor works
Blog public/private toggle functionality working
Blog entries appear in list after creation
Library page loads with proper layout
Create library folders functionality working
Create library entries with rich text editor works
Library entries appear in list after creation
Rich text editor toolbar features working (Bold, Italic, Underline)
Rich text editor bullet list functionality working
Rich text formatting saves and displays correctly
All Phase 3 backend APIs working (34/34 tests passed)
Diary CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Gallery folder operations with recursive structure
Blog entries with public/private visibility control
Library folder and entry management
Search functionality across all Phase 3 features
Rich text content storage and retrieval
View tracking for blog and library entries
Public access controls for blog and library content
